#HeSaid : if our old leaders would come back to life today, what would we tell them we did with the gift of freedom they fought for?
#HeSaid : we will come back and say, " but what do you mean that building is a prison? When I left it was a church"
#HeSaid: when someone is down, they have nowhere to fall to. They are not afraid. What is there to fear?
He said: we are using the wrong yardstick to measure. Mistake number one. We presume they learnt like we did & were influenced like we were
He said: they built Makerere for medicine, Jomo Kenyatta for engineering & U Dar es Salaam for law. What happened? How did we let it happen?
